# AVCaptionRegion.DisplayAlignment.center

**Case**

An alignment that positions lines in the middle of the block progression direction.

## Declaration

```swift
case center
```

## Discussion

The Apple iTT caption format doesn’t support this alignment.

## Display alignments

- **AVCaptionRegion.DisplayAlignment.before**: An alignment that positions lines at the top of the block progression direction.
- **AVCaptionRegion.DisplayAlignment.after**: An alignment that positions lines at the bottom of the block progression direction.
